item.description:
This is a pre-existing weekly playgroup. The Conservation Area is at the end of North Street. You should park near the Montague Center Common and walk in from there, since parking at the entrance is very limited. This is a beautiful area with trails through fields and woods, located just minutes from the Montague Center common. The Sawmill River intersects the area which in summertime is lush with wildflowers, trees, and butterflies. Come enjoy! This is a dog friendly area, please be prepared to pick up, there are is a trash can and usually there are bags available on site.

You can see pictures from last fall:
http://www.new.facebo...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a black lab with a bright blue leash

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!
